text: Morning Joe is an American morning news talk show. It airs weekdays from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time on the cable news channel MSNBC. It features former US Representative (Independent) Joe Scarborough reporting and discussing the news of the day in a panel format with co-hosts Mika Brzezinski and Willie Geist. It began as a fill-in program after Don Imus' Imus in the Morning was canceled in April 2007. title: Morning Joe
